text:
"Chicken Run 2" is an upcoming stop motion animated comedy movie, directed by Sam Fell, produced by Aardman Animations and StudioCanal (in partnership with Lionsgate), and written by Karey Kirkpatrick and John O'Farrell. It is the sequel to "Chicken Run" (2000).
"Chicken Run 2" was announced on April 26, 2018, set for an unknown release.
